code: import axios from"axios";export var GET_NOTIFICATION="GET_NOTIFICATION";export var CREATE_NOTIFICATION="CREATE_NOTIFICATION";export var DELETE_NOTIFICATION="DELETE_NOTIFICATION";export var DELETE_ALL_NOTIFICATION="DELETE_ALL_NOTIFICATION";export var getNotification=function getNotification(){return function(dispatch){axios.get("/api/notification").then(function(res){dispatch({type:GET_NOTIFICATION,payload:res.data});});};};export var deleteNotification=function deleteNotification(id){return function(dispatch){axios.post("/api/notification/delete",{id:id}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:DELETE_NOTIFICATION,payload:res.data});});};};export var deleteAllNotification=function deleteAllNotification(){return function(dispatch){axios.post("/api/notification/delete-all").then(function(res){dispatch({type:DELETE_ALL_NOTIFICATION,payload:res.data});});};};export var createNotification=function createNotification(notification){return function(dispatch){axios.post("/api/notification/add",{notification:notification}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:CREATE_NOTIFICATION,payload:res.data});});};};
